elements.name: Verify API: getIndustryCount API return Total Industry Count

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getIndustryCount"
User calls "getIndustryCount" API with "Get" http Request
Verify industry_Count result is greater than 0
The API call is success with StatusCode 200

elements.name: Verify API: createIndustry API add Industry payload

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Industry Payload
User calls "createIndustry" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return Industry instance
Verify Total industry_Count increased by 1

elements.name: Verify API: createIndustry API with no industry Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Industry Payload  with no Industry Body
User calls "createIndustry" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.industry.entity.Industry com.ibm.dc.industry.controller.IndustryController.createIndustry(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.industry.entity.Industry)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.industry.entity.Industry com.ibm.dc.industry.controller.IndustryController.createIndustry(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.industry.entity.Industry)"

elements.name: Verify API: getAllIndustries API return List of All Industries

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getAllIndustries"
User calls "getAllIndustries" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Industries
Total number of Industry in List is equal to getIndustryCount
Industry added exist in returned Industry List

elements.name: Verify API: getIndustryBySearchCriteria API, search no SearchCriteria

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getIndustryBySearchCriteria"
User calls "getIndustryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Industries
All Industries should have Active Status

elements.name: Verify API: getIndustryBySearchCriteria API, search by 'industryId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getIndustryBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "industryId"
User calls "getIndustryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Industries
Response should be list of Industries and size should be one
Industry added exist in returned Industry List

elements.name: Verify API: getIndustryBySearchCriteria API, search by 'industryName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getIndustryBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "industryName"
User calls "getIndustryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Industries
Industry added exist in returned Industry List

elements.name: Verify API: getIndustryBySearchCriteria API, search by 'industrySectorName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getIndustryBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "industrySectorName"
User calls "getIndustryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Industries
Industry added exist in returned Industry List

elements.name: Verify API: getIndustryBySearchCriteria API, search by 'industryId' & 'industryName' & 'industrySectorName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getIndustryBySearchCriteria with Parameter: 'industryId' & 'industryName' & 'industrySectorName'
User calls "getIndustryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Industries
Response should be list of Industries and size should be one
Industry added exist in returned Industry List

elements.name: Verify API: getIndustryBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'industryId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getIndustryBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "industryId" = "-9"
User calls "getIndustryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Industries with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: getIndustryBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'industryId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getIndustryBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "industryName" = "invalidIndustryName"
User calls "getIndustryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Industries with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: getIndustryBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'industryId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getIndustryBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "industrySectorName" = "invalidIndustrySectorName"
User calls "getIndustryBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Industries with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: deleteIndustry update Industry status as Passive

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke deleteIndustry with Parameter: "industryId"
User calls "deleteIndustry" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify IndustryStatus of particular Industry updated as Passive

elements.name: Verify API: deleteIndustry API,  with invalid industryId

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "deleteIndustry" with invalid Parameter: "industryId" = "-9"
User calls "deleteIndustry" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 500
"message" in response body is "Industry with id - -9 not found"

elements.name: Verify API: deleteIndustry API, with no Param

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "deleteIndustry" with no Param
User calls "deleteIndustry" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required Integer parameter 'industryId' is not present"

elements.name: Verify API: updateIndustry API add Industry paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Industry Payload
User calls "updateIndustry" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify Industry fields gets updated

elements.name: Verify API: updateIndustry API, with no Industry Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Industry Payload  with no Industry Body
User calls "updateIndustry" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.industry.entity.Industry com.ibm.dc.industry.controller.IndustryController.updateIndustry(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.industry.entity.Industry)"
